job_tasks.phrase: ontwikkelen van web-applicaties op verschillende manieren
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly refers to building web applications, a core aspect of software development.

job_tasks.phrase: ontwikkelen van end-to-end webapplicaties met behulp van Python en Django
job_tasks.justification: Explicitly mentions developing end-to-end web applications using specific technologies, fitting the software development category.

job_tasks.phrase: schrijven van efficiënte, onderhoudsvriendelijke en schaalbare code voor verschillende applicaties van het platform
job_tasks.justification: Focuses on code quality, maintainability, and scalability, which are key software development principles.

job_tasks.phrase: samenwerken met data scientist en data engineers om LLM's te integreren
job_tasks.justification: Directly mentions integrating Large Language Models (LLMs), which falls under the modeling category, specifically in the context of generative AI.

job_tasks.phrase: samenwerken met data scientist en data engineers
job_tasks.justification: Indicates collaboration with data scientists and data engineers, suggesting involvement in data-related workflows.

job_tasks.phrase: Je bent op de hoogte van de nieuwste ontwikkelingen op het gebied van GenAI, LLM
job_tasks.justification: Highlights the need to stay updated on Generative AI and LLM advancements, directly related to modeling tasks and understanding.

job_tasks.phrase: met je stakeholders om de behoeftes te begrijpen
job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates understanding user or client needs, which is a fundamental aspect of business understanding in a technical role.
Advising on technical solutions requires understanding business needs and translating them into technical strategies.

job_tasks.phrase: hoogwaardige softwareproducten op tijd en binnen het budget te leveren
job_tasks.justification: Focuses on the delivery of software products, a key outcome of software development efforts.

soft_skills.phrase: werk je nauw samen met data scientist en data engineers
Je bent op de hoogte van de nieuwste ontwikkelingen op het gebied van GenAI, LLM en softwareontwikkeling
begeleid je junior developers, deel je jouw kennis en ervaring
uitvoeren van code-reviews, het geven van constructieve feedback
nieuwe inzichten en aanbevelingen te komen ter optimalisatie van onze producten
Werk je nauw samen met je stakeholders om de behoeftes te begrijpen

classification.rationale: The role emphasizes developing web applications integrating LLMs and staying updated on GenAI/LLM advancements. While it includes significant software development tasks, the explicit mention of LLM integration and GenAI points towards a GenAI Engineer profile rather than a purely ML Engineer or traditional Software Developer.
